title: Kate Green – 2021 Comments on Apprentices
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kate Green, the Shadow Education Secretary, on 3 August 2021.
content:
Under the Tories the number of new apprenticeships is plummeting, with tens of thousands of people unable to access these opportunities.
